article.title: The spatially resolved stellar population and ionized gas properties in the merger LIRG NGC 2623

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the black rectangle in the top panel of Figure 1 indicate?
choices: The field of view (FoV) of the LArr IFS data.
The FoV of the PPaK IFS data.
The location of the outflow in NGC 2623.
The location of the youngest star forming regions in NGC 2623.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate stellar mass surface density (log µ) at 1 HLR for NGC 2623 according to both CALIFA and LArr data?
How does the average light-weighted stellar age of NGC 2623 at ∼1 HLR compare to Sbc-Sc control galaxies?
What does the term wxyz represent in Formula (2)?
choices: The fractional contribution of a spaxel to the total flux in a zone.
The stellar mass in a spaxel.
The total stellar mass of the galaxy.
